name: War Of Gold 2 Mission 99
description:
Story:

War of gold game sequel Third person war themed shooter game. Gold are again stolen from Evil army from East and your mission is to kill enemy army soldiers. Enemy soldiers are heavy equipped with rifle and other different weapons. Stolen gold are hidden somewhere at level and you need find it. There is 10 different locations like forest, city, facility factory etc. Player need use different weapons like rifle, pistol and also grenades to survive. Also need collect more ammos at different levels. After player dies he need start level from start point

Features:

- 10 different themed maps
- Several weapons like pistol and rifle
- Grenades to throw, several different grenades
- Collect ammo pick ups and more grenades
- Enemy soldiers
- Explosive barrels
- Inventory
- Looting. Player can collect ammos and grenades from death soldiers
- Steam achievements

Planned updates:

- More maps
